name: Momentjs.com & Momentjs.com/timezone/ Dark
description: A dark theme for Momentjs.com and Momentjs.com/timezone/ Changes the background to dark, and makes so code examples don't look terrible and changed the background colors of some headers to dark purple. (Previously the blue and green was way too bright). Tested on all pages of the site
